sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) as UTC_TAG_COUNT FROM log.source_register_table
WHERE ETL_UTC_TAG > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
AND (ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'N' AND ETL_RUN_STATUS IS NOT NULL)
;

SELECT 
       stuff( (SELECT ', '+original_blob_name 
               FROM log.source_register_table
			   where etl_is_processed = 'N'
			   and etl_run_status is not null
			   and etl_utc_tag > '@{pipeline().parameters.Master_Utc_Tag}'
			   order by original_blob_name
               FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') as ErrorDuringProcess_Files
;

activities.name: ForEachFile

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTREC
  FROM [log].[Source_Register_Table]
  WHERE [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] = '@{item().name}'
  AND [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME AS TARGET_BLOB_NAME 
FROM LOG.SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE 
WHERE ETL_IS_PROCESSED = 'E'
AND DATEDIFF(DAY,INSERT_TIMESTAMP,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE 'AUS Eastern Standard Time')) < 8

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT ERROR_COUNT,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN 'SUCCESS'
  ELSE 'FAIL'
  END RUN_STATUS,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE 'Not all record loaded successfully'
  END COMMENT_MSG
  FROM (
        SELECT COUNT(*) ERROR_COUNT FROM @{pipeline().parameters.ErrorTableName}
)x

activities.description: Sub Master to run children pipelines in parallel

WorkbookName.defaultValue: Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, CASE WHEN LEN(Error_Messages) = 0 THEN 'Workbook Processed Successfully' ELSE 'Workbook Processed with Errors' END AS Message_Header, CONCAT('Hi ',Ops_Representative_First_Name,'

') AS Message_1, CASE WHEN LEN(Error_Messages) = 0 THEN CONCAT('The file \"',Work_Book,'\" has been processed successfully') ELSE CONCAT('The file \"',Work_Book,'\" has been processed but there were some errors in the worksheet[s] below:') END AS Message_2, Error_Messages AS Message_3, CASE WHEN LEN(Error_Messages) = 0 THEN 'Please contact your New Forests Operations representative if you have any queries.' ELSE 'Please review and re-submit the workbook. Please contact your New Forests Operations representative if you have any queries.' END AS Message_4, 'Regards,

New Forests Operations Team' AS Message_5 FROM ( SELECT Message_Header, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_First_Name, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Work_Book, CONCAT( CASE WHEN [Certifications] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Certifications],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Timber Sales] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Timber Sales],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Contracts] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Contracts],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Harvest Reconcilliation] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Harvest Reconcilliation],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Major Severe Incidents] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Major Severe Incidents],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Operations] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Operations],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Other Sales] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Other Sales],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Related Party Transactions] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Related Party Transactions],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Risk Opportunity Register] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Risk Opportunity Register],'
') END, CASE WHEN [Strategic Projects] LIKE '%: Error Count : 0 >>>%' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT([Strategic Projects],'
') END ) AS Error_Messages FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT('Operations - Load Report for Workbook ',x.Work_Book) AS Message_Header, ass.Ops_Representative_Email, ass.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ass.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, x.Work_Sheet, x.Work_Book, CONCAT(x.Work_Sheet,' : Error Count : ',CASE WHEN x.Error_Count > 0 THEN CONCAT(CAST(x.Error_Count AS VARCHAR),' >>> Missing mandatory fields') WHEN x.Error_Count = 0 AND x.Asset_Id IS NULL THEN 'Unknown >>> Failed Load' ELSE CONCAT(CAST(x.Error_Count AS VARCHAR),' >>> Successfully Loaded') END) AS Error_Count FROM ( SELECT err.Work_Book, err.Work_Sheet, err.Error_Count, wb.Asset_Id, wb.Fund_Id FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT 'Certifications' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Timber Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Answers_DWH_Export' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Answers_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Contracts' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Harvest Reconcilliation' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Major Severe Incidents' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Operations' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Other Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Related Party Transactions' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Risk Opportunity Register' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' UNION SELECT 'Strategic Projects' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_book, COUNT(*) AS Error_Count FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error WHERE Source_File = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' ) err ON wb.Work_Book = err.Work_Book and wb.Work_Sheet = err.Work_Sheet )x JOIN relational.Asset ass ON 1=1 WHERE ass.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' AND ass.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}' AND ass.record_deleted_flag = 0 ) t PIVOT( MAX(Error_Count) FOR Work_Sheet IN ( [Certifications], [Timber Sales], [Answers_DWH_Export], [Contracts], [Harvest Reconcilliation], [Major Severe Incidents], [Operations], [Other Sales], [Related Party Transactions], [Risk Opportunity Register], [Strategic Projects]) ) AS pivot_table )z;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 'Operations workbook submitted' AS Message_Header, CONCAT('Hi ',Ops_Representative_First_Name) AS Message_1, CONCAT('Thank you for submitting ','\"','@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}','\". This is now being processed and we will be in contact shortly to confirm processing is complete.
') AS Message_2, CONCAT('Regards,','

','New Forests Operations Team') AS Message_3, Ops_Representative_Email, Ops_Representative_Last_Name, Ops_Representative_First_Name FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT ra.Ops_Representative_First_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Last_Name, ra.Ops_Representative_Email FROM relational.Asset ra WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND ra.Asset_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Asset_ID}' AND ra.Fund_ID = '@{pipeline().parameters.Fund_ID}' )z;

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT ERROR_COUNT,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN 'SUCCESS'
  ELSE 'FAIL'
  END RUN_STATUS,
  CASE WHEN ERROR_COUNT = 0 THEN NULL
  ELSE 'Not all Excel sheets have been loaded with no error'
  END COMMENT_MSG
  FROM (
       SELECT SUM(ERROR_COUNT) ERROR_COUNT FROM (
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Certifications' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Certification_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Certifications' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
             UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Timber Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Timber_Sales_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Timber Sales' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
			 UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Contracts' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Contract_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Contracts' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
             UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Harvest Reconcilliation' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Harvest_Reconciliation_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Harvest Reconcilliation' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
			 UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Major Severe Incidents' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Incident_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Major Severe Incidents' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
             UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Operations' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Operation_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Operations' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
			 UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Related Party Transactions' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Related_Party_Transaction_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Related Party Transactions' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
             UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Risk Opportunity Register' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Risk Opportunity Register' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
			 UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Other Sales' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Sales_Other_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Other Sales' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
             UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Strategic Projects' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Strategic_Project_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Strategic Projects' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
             UNION ALL
			 SELECT CASE WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT > 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 1 WHEN ef.ERROR_COUNT = 0 AND wb.Work_Sheet IS NOT NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS ERROR_COUNT
			 FROM audit.OPS_Workbook_Worksheet_Asset_List wb
			 RIGHT JOIN 
             (SELECT 'Answers_DWH_Export' AS Work_Sheet, '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}' AS Work_Book, COUNT(*) AS ERROR_COUNT 
			  FROM audit.OPS_Answers_Error
			  WHERE SOURCE_SUB_FILE = 'Answers_DWH_Export' AND SOURCE_FILE = '@{pipeline().parameters.WorkbookName}') ef
			 ON wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet AND wb.Work_Sheet = ef.Work_Sheet
)x
)z

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TOP 1 [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];

SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, RUNNING_STATE FROM (
SELECT ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 1 AS RUNNING_STATE
FROM [log].[SOURCE_REGISTER_TABLE]
WHERE [ETL_RUN_STATUS] = 'RUNNING'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'ADJ_MNL_%'
UNION
SELECT 'NO FILE' AS ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME, 0 AS RUNNING_STATE
)x
ORDER BY RUNNING_STATE DESC;

SELECT count(*) Total_Error
  FROM [staging].[COA_Adjustments]
  WHERE [validation_error] IS NOT NULL

SELECT TOP 1 [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],

      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spCon ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPConsolidated
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spEst ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPEstate
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' spOth ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_spFSOPOther
      ,CONCAT('TGR ', Fund_ID, ' ', Asset_ID, ' ', Version_name, ' param ', FORMAT(START_DATETIME,'yyyyMMdd hhmm'),'.csv') AS TargetFileName_param
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]

SELECT VERSION_NAME, COUNT(*) AS TO_PROCESS
FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0
GROUP BY VERSION_NAME

FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

FROM [relational].[Forecast_Asset_reference]
WHERE record_deleted_flag = 0 AND IsProcessed = 0

SELECT CASE WHEN OFFSET_ERROR IS NULL THEN '' ELSE OFFSET_ERROR END AS OFFSET_ERROR FROM (
SELECT 
stuff( (SELECT ', '+CONCAT(FAR.Fund_ID,'  ',FAR.Asset_ID,'  ',FAR.Version_name,
'  Asset-Ref-Asset-Offset: ',FAR.Asset_Offset,'  Parameter-Asset-Offset: ',FCP.Asset_offset)
FROM relational.Forecast_Asset_reference FAR
JOIN staging.Forecast_Param FCP
ON FAR.Fund_ID = FCP.Fund_ID AND FAR.Asset_ID = FCP.Asset_ID 
AND FAR.Version_name = FCP.Version_name
WHERE FAR.Asset_Offset < CAST(FCP.Asset_offset AS INT) 
AND FAR.record_deleted_flag = 0 AND FAR.IsProcessed = 0
ORDER BY FAR.Version_name
FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'varchar(max)'),1,1,'') AS OFFSET_ERROR
)x

properties.description: Update or insert budget mapping for source text and move source to archive

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	process_name as string,
	ETL_local as string,
	useremail as string
}
source(output(
		View_Name as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Category as string,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item_Index as integer,
		Item as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MappingText
AuditFields alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
MappingText derive(Update_Time = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Process_Name = $process_name,
		UserEmail = $useremail) ~> AuditFields
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		GL_Code as string,
		GL_Desc as string,
		View_Name as string,
		Category as string,
		process_name as string,
		Sub_Category as string,
		Item as string,
		Category_Index as integer,
		Sub_Category_Index as integer,
		Item_Index as integer,
		CF_Code as string,
		CF_Description as string,
		CPM_Code as string,
		CPM_Description as string,
		update_datetime as timestamp,
		update_user as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['View_Name','GL_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:['UPDATE relational.COA_Views\nSET CPM_Code = COA.Reporting_5, GL_Desc = COA.GL_Desc\n\nFROM\n\nrelational.Chart_of_Account COA JOIN relational.COA_Views v on COA.GL_Code = v.GL_Code\n\nWHERE COA.record_deleted_flag = 0'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		GL_Code,
		View_Name,
		Category,
		process_name = Process_Name,
		Sub_Category,
		Item,
		Category_Index,
		Sub_Category_Index,
		Item_Index,
		update_datetime = Update_Time,
		update_user = UserEmail
	)) ~> COAViews

properties.description: sums four columns from Estate sheet for each TM model

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Version as string,
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		Period as string,
		PlunitID as string,
		Plunit as string,
		OriginID as string,
		Origin as string,
		SpeciesID as string,
		Species as string,
		PerpetualArea as string,
		CurrentArea as string,
		FutureArea as string,
		Disposed as string,
		Acquired as string,
		PerpetualFinalFell as string,
		CurrentFinalFell as string,
		FutureFinalFell as string,
		PerpetualLand as string,
		CurrentLand as string,
		FutureLand as string,
		PerpetualRental as string,
		CurrentRental as string,
		FutureRental as string,
		PerpetualOverhead as string,
		CurrentOverhead as string,
		FutureOverhead as string,
		PerpetualRates as string,
		CurrentRates as string,
		FutureRates as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ForestModel
ForestModel select(mapColumn(
		Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period,
		PerpetualArea,
		PerpetualFinalFell,
		PerpetualLand,
		PerpetualRental,
		PerpetualOverhead,
		PerpetualRates
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ForestModelColumns
NumericValues aggregate(groupBy(Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period),
	PerpetualArea = sum(PerpetualArea),
		PerpetualFinalFell = sum(PerpetualFinalFell),
		PerpetualLand = sum(PerpetualLand),
		PerpetualRental = sum(PerpetualRental),
		PerpetualOverhead = sum(PerpetualOverhead),
		PerpetualRates = sum(PerpetualRates)) ~> ColumnSums
Unpivot1 derive(Status = 'Estate_Calcs') ~> AddStatus
ForestModelColumns derive(PerpetualArea = toDouble(PerpetualArea),
		PerpetualFinalFell = toDouble(PerpetualFinalFell),
		PerpetualLand = toDouble(PerpetualLand),
		PerpetualRental = toDouble(PerpetualRental),
		PerpetualOverhead = toDouble(PerpetualOverhead),
		PerpetualRates = toDouble(PerpetualRates)) ~> NumericValues
ColumnSums unpivot(output(
		Product as string,
		Perpetual as double
	),
	ungroupBy(Version,
		Fund,
		Asset,
		Period),
	lateral: false,
	ignoreNullPivots: true) ~> Unpivot1
AddStatus sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Period as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as string,
		Curent_Amount as string,
		Future_Amount as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string,
		Share_Perpetual as string,
		Entity as string,
		Destination as string,
		Category as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Period,
		Status,
		Product,
		Perpetual_Amount = Perpetual,
		Fund_ID = Fund,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		Version_name = Version
	)) ~> DBStaging

parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(

		Indicator_Id = Indicator_Id_Lkp,
		Origin_Port_ID = Region_ID_Lkp_OP,
		Destination_Port_ID = Region_ID_Lkp_DP,
		Market,
		Vessel_Name = {Vessel Name},
		Value,
		Comment,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Batch_ID,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
RemoveInvalidType derive(Value = toDecimal(iifNull(Value, '0'),20,4),
		Data_Source_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Species_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Species_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Product_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Product_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Type_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Type_ID_Lkp, -1),
		UOM_ID_Lkp = iifNull(UOM_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Currency_ID_Lkp = iifNull(Currency_ID_Lkp, -1),
		Indicator_Id_Lkp = iifNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp_OP = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP, -1),
		Region_ID_Lkp_DP = iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP, -1)) ~> DataTransformation3
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull({Period Date})) || 
not(isNull({Source Metric})) || 
not(isNull({Species Common Name})) || 
not(isNull({Product Common Name})) || 
( not(isNull(Country)) && not(isNull(Region)) ) ||
( not(isNull(Country)) && isNull(Region) ) ||  
( not(isNull(Type)) && not(isNull(Basis)) )) ~> FilterInvalidRows
FilterInvalidRows derive(Period_Date_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(DateDimension_Date_Lkp), "Period Date Error/", ""),
		Source_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Data_Source_Id_Lkp), "Source Error/", ""),
		Region_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(iifNull(Region_ID_Lkp_CR, Region_ID_Lkp_CO)), "Region Error/", ""),
		Type_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Type_Lkp) || isNull(Basis_Lkp), "Type Error/", ""),
		Species_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp), "Species Error/", ""),
		Product_ErrMsg = iif(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp), "Product Error/", ""),
		Currency_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(Currency)) && isNull(Currency_ID_Lkp), "Currency Error/", ""),
		Uom_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(UOM)) && isNull(UOM_ID_Lkp), "UOM Error/", ""),
		DeliveryPoint_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull({Delivery Point})) && isNull(Delivery_Point_ID_Lkp), "Delivery Point Error/", ""),
		Indicator_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(Indicator)) && isNull(Indicator_Id_Lkp), "Indicator Error/", ""),
		OriginPort_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull({Origin Port Country})) || not(isNull({Destination Port Region})) || not(isNull({Origin Port})) && isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_OP), "Origin Port Error/", ""),
		DestinationPort_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull({Destination Port Country})) || not(isNull({Destination Port Region})) || not(isNull({Destination Port})) && isNull(Region_ID_Lkp_DP), "Destination Port Error/", ""),
		Species_Product_Combo_ErrMsg = iif(not(isNull(Product_Id_Lkp)) && not(isNull(Species_ID_Lkp)) && notEquals({Species Common Name},Product_Species_Common_Name_Lkp), "Species Product Combination Error/", "")) ~> DerivedErrorMessage
DerivedErrorMessage derive(Combined_ErrMsg = concat(Period_Date_ErrMsg, Source_ErrMsg, Region_ErrMsg, Type_ErrMsg, Species_ErrMsg, Product_ErrMsg, Currency_ErrMsg, Uom_ErrMsg, DeliveryPoint_ErrMsg, Indicator_ErrMsg, OriginPort_ErrMsg, DestinationPort_ErrMsg, Species_Product_Combo_ErrMsg)) ~> CombinedErrMsg
CombinedErrMsg select(mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name = {Source Metric},
		Period_Date = {Period Date},
		Country,
		Region,
		Species_Common_Name = {Species Common Name},
		Product_Common_Name = {Product Common Name},
		Currency,
		UOM,
		Market,
		Delivery_Point = {Delivery Point},
		Indicator,
		Type,
		Basis,
		Origin_Port_Country = {Origin Port Country},
		Origin_Port_Region = {Origin Port Region},
		Origin_Port = {Origin Port},
		Destination_Port_Country = {Destination Port Country},
		Destination_Port_Region = {Destination Port Region},
		Destination_Port = {Destination Port},
		Vessel_Name = {Vessel Name},
		Low,
		High,
		Average,
		Spot,
		Comment,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = Combined_ErrMsg
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectErrorOutput
DatamartDimProductLkp filter(Product_Group == $Product_Group) ~> FilterProcessGroup
LookupDimType filter(not(isNull(Type_ID_Lkp))) ~> RemoveInvalidType
SelectOutput aggregate(groupBy(Period_Date,
		Data_Source_Id,
		Region_ID,
		Species_ID,
		Product_Id,
		Type_ID),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> GetFactBusinessKeys
GetFactBusinessKeys select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Data_Source_Id,
		Region_ID,
		Species_ID,
		Product_Id,
		Type_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDeleteColumns
SelectDeleteColumns alterRow(deleteIf(not(isNull(Period_Date)))) ~> AlterRowDelete
SelectErrorOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: (1),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Metric_Short_Name,

		Comment,

		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> FactErrorTable
SelectOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: (3),
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Data_Source_ID = Data_Source_Id,
		Region_ID,

		Product_ID = Product_Id,
		Type_ID,
		UOM_ID,

AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,

	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Period_Date','Data_Source_ID','Region_ID','Species_ID','Product_ID','Type_ID'],

properties.description: NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,CASE WHEN COA.GL_Code IS NOT NULL THEN COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] ELSE TRX.Cash_Flow_Code END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(Trx_Type != 'Actual' || Trx_Desc != 'Beginning Balance:',
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(TrxCodeNotBeginningBalance, TrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@TrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
SelectOutput alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0)) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Start_Date_Tag as date,
		End_Date_Tag as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRecords

properties.description: NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only

typeProperties.script:
parameters{

	FileName as string,

}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_ID]\n      ,[Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n      ,[Update_datetime]\n      ,[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [Trx_Type] != \'Actual\'\n  AND[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	Debit_Credit!=Relation_Debit_Credit || Trx_Amount!=Relation_Trx_Amount,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, StagingChangedRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_Update_datetime = Update_datetime,
		Relation_record_deleted_flag = record_deleted_flag,
		Relation_process_name = process_name,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-',$ProcessName,$FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Trx_ID = toLong(null())) ~> AddAuditColumns
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('-', $ProcessName, $FileName),
		insert_update_flag = toString('I'),
		Trx_ID = toLong(null())) ~> UpdateAddAuditAttributes
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(record_deleted_flag = toInteger(1),
		insert_update_flag = toString('U')) ~> AddExpiredAttributes
UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		Trx_ID,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForInsert
AddAuditColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionForDB
AddExpiredAttributes select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code = Relation_Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Relation_Asset_ID,
		GL_Code = Relation_GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code = Relation_Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit = Relation_Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type = Relation_Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date = Relation_Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc = Relation_Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount = Relation_Trx_Amount,
		process_name = Relation_process_name,
		Update_datetime = Relation_Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		Trx_ID = Relation_Trx_ID,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> UpdateSelectForExpire
UnionForDB select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Trx_ID,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
SelectOutput sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as string,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as string,
		Trx_ID as string,
		Update_datetime as string,
		record_deleted_flag as string,
		process_name as string,
		insert_update_flag as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['AdjustmentLoadReadyFile.txt'],
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Trx_ID,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name,
		insert_update_flag
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> InsertUpdateRecords

properties.description:
NOTE:This DF only cater for INSERT. There is no Update to Expire for consideration The branch containing "UpdateSelectForExpire" kept for reference only
Check for Beginning Balance is deprecated but remained in DF in case we ever need to use it again

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		validation_error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingDB
source(output(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT TRX.[Trx_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Code]\n      ,TRX.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n      ,TRX.[GL_Code]\n      ,TRX.Cash_Flow_Code\n      ,TRX.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Type]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Date]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Desc]\n      ,TRX.[Trx_Amount]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.GL_Code = COA.GL_Code AND COA.record_deleted_flag = 0\n  WHERE TRX.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND DATEDIFF(DAY,TRX.Update_datetime,CONVERT(smalldatetime,CONVERT(datetimeoffset, SYSDATETIME()) AT TIME ZONE \'AUS Eastern Standard Time\')) <= 365',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB
source(output(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Trx_Code]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Asset_ID]\n      ,[GL_Code]\n      ,[Trx_Type]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Transactions]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  AND [Trx_Type] = \'Actual\'\n  AND [Trx_Desc] = \'Beginning Balance:\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly
StagingDB derive(StagingChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> StatgingAddChecksum
StatgingAddChecksum, RelationRenameColumns lookup(StagingChecksum == Relation_RelationalChecksum,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRelationalStream
RelationDB derive(RelationalChecksum = sha2(256, Trx_Code,Fund_ID,Asset_ID,GL_Code,Cash_Flow_Code,Trx_Type,Trx_Date,Trx_Desc,Debit_Credit,Trx_Amount)) ~> RelationalAddChecksum
LookupRelationalStream split(isNull(Relation_RelationalChecksum),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@(StagingNewRow, IgnoreNoChange)
RelationalAddChecksum select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Trx_ID = Trx_ID,
		Relation_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		Relation_Cash_Flow_Code = Cash_Flow_Code,
		Relation_Debit_Credit = Debit_Credit,
		Relation_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		Relation_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		Relation_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc,
		Relation_Trx_Amount = Trx_Amount,
		Relation_RelationalChecksum = RelationalChecksum
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> RelationRenameColumns
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@AllRecordsIncludeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectNewStagingRow
SelectNewStagingRow, SelectBeginingBalanceColumns union(byName: true)~> UnionNewTransactions
AddAuditColumns select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOutput
RelationDBbeginningbalanceonly select(mapColumn(
		RelationBB_Trx_Code = Trx_Code,
		RelationBB_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		RelationBB_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		RelationBB_GL_Code = GL_Code,
		RelationBB_Trx_Type = Trx_Type,
		RelationBB_Trx_Date = Trx_Date,
		RelationBB_Trx_Desc = Trx_Desc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance
ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow split(true(),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@(AllRecordsIncludeBeginningBalance, DeprecatedTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalance@DeprecatedTrxCodeBeginningBalance, SelectDBcolumnsBeginningBalance lookup(Trx_Code == RelationBB_Trx_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupDBbeginningBalance
LookupDBbeginningBalance split(isNull(RelationBB_Trx_Code),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@(NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance, ExistingTrxCodeBeginningBalance)
IsTrxCodeBeginningBalanceExist@NewTrxCodeBeginningBalance select(mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectBeginingBalanceColumns
UnionNewTransactions derive(Update_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),
		process_name = concatWS('_',$ProcessName,$FileName)) ~> AddAuditColumns
SelectOutput alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==0)) ~> AlterRowInsert
AlterRowInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Trx_ID as long,
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Type as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string,
		Start_Date_Tag as date,
		End_Date_Tag as date
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Type,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount,
		Update_datetime,
		record_deleted_flag,
		process_name
	)) ~> InsertRecords

	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,

	),

ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingNewRow select(mapColumn(

	),

SelectNewStagingRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),

UnionForDB alterRow(insertIf(record_deleted_flag==toInteger(0)),

ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(start_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		end_datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		record_deleted_flag = toInteger(0),

ConditionalSplitNewOrExpire@StagingChangedRow derive(end_datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),

UpdateAddAuditAttributes select(mapColumn(

parameters{

source(output(

	),

source(output(
		Version_Name as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Budget_Type as string,
		Budget_Date as timestamp,
		Budget_Desc as string,
		Budget_value as decimal(18,2),
		Update_datetime as timestamp,
		record_deleted_flag as integer,
		process_name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT REL.[Version_Name]\n      ,REL.[Fund_ID]\n      ,REL.[Asset_ID]\n      ,REL.[GL_Code]\n      ,REL.[Cash_Flow_Code]\n      ,REL.[Debit_Credit]\n      ,REL.[Budget_Type]\n      ,REL.[Budget_Date]\n      ,REL.[Budget_Desc]\n      ,REL.[Budget_value]\n      ,REL.[Update_datetime]\n      ,REL.[record_deleted_flag]\n      ,REL.[process_name]\n  FROM [relational].[COA_Budgets] REL\n  JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT VERSION_NAME FROM [staging].[COA_Budgets]) STG\n  ON REL.Version_Name = STG.Version_Name\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB

	query: '  SELECT CASE WHEN Trx_Desc = \'Beginning Balance:\' THEN CONCAT(TRX.[Trx_Code],\'-\',FUN.[Fund_ID]) ELSE Trx_Code END AS Trx_Code\n      ,FUN.[Fund_ID]\n      ,TRX.[Asset_ID]\n	  ,TRX.GL_Code\n      ,[Debit_Credit]\n      ,[Trx_Date]\n      ,[Trx_Desc]\n      ,[Trx_Amount]\n	  ,CASE WHEN COA.[GL_Code] IS NULL THEN \'NO GL_CODE DURING LOAD\' ELSE COA.[Cash_Flow_Code] END AS Cash_Flow_Code\n  FROM [staging].[COA_Transactions] TRX\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Chart_of_Account] COA\n  ON TRX.[GL_Code] = COA.[GL_Code] AND COA.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Fund] FUN\n  ON TRX.[Fund_ID] = FUN.[Company_Name] AND FUN.[record_deleted_flag] = 0\n  LEFT JOIN [relational].[Asset] ASS\n  ON TRX.[Asset_ID] = ASS.[Asset_ID] AND FUN.[Fund_ID] = ASS.[Fund_ID] AND ASS.[record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB

	format: 'query') ~> RelationDB

parameters{
	ProcessName as string,
	FileName as string,
	Etl_Utc_Tag as string
}
source(output(
		Period_Date as timestamp,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Status as string,
		Product as string,
		Entity as string,
		Category as string,
		Destination as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Cash_Flow_Code as string,
		Perpetual_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Current_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Future_Amount as decimal(25,10),
		Share_Perpetual as decimal(25,10),
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Forecast_Type as string,
		Version_name as string,
		UOM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT \n --REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS REF_ASSET_OFFSET , PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS PAR_ASSET_OFFSET, PAR.DESC_YEAR, DAT.PERIOD,\n CASE WHEN REF.ASSET_OFFSET = PAR.ASSET_OFFSET \n          THEN DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n          ELSE DATEADD(YEAR,CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)-CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)+( CAST(DAT.PERIOD AS INT) - 1 ),CAST(CONCAT(PAR.DESC_YEAR,\'-01-01\') AS DATETIME)) \n END AS Period_Date,\n REF.FUND_ID AS Fund_ID,\n REF.ASSET_ID AS Asset_ID,\n DAT.STATUS AS Status, \n DAT.PRODUCT AS Product, \n DAT.ENTITY AS Entity,\n DAT.CATEGORY AS Category,\n DAT.Destination AS Destination,\n CASE WHEN PRD.GL_CODE IS NULL THEN \'IGNORE\' ELSE PRD.GL_CODE END AS GL_Code,\n CAST(NULL AS VARCHAR(100)) AS Cash_Flow_Code,\n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN CAST(CAST(DAT.PERPETUAL_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ELSE\n ABS(( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) )) END AS Perpetual_Amount,\n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) END AS Current_Amount, \n CASE WHEN DAT.[Status] = \'Estate_Calcs\' THEN 0 ELSE CAST(CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) END AS Future_Amount,\n CAST(CAST(DAT.SHARE_PERPETUAL AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) AS Share_Perpetual,\n CASE WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n      WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'DR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'CR\'\n	  WHEN UPPER(COA.DEBIT_CREDIT) = \'CR\' AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) < 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  WHEN COA.DEBIT_CREDIT IS NULL AND ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\'\n	  ELSE \'CR\'\n END AS Debit_Credit,\n-- CASE WHEN ( CAST(CAST(DAT.CURENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) + CAST(DAT.FUTURE_AMOUNT AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(25,10)) ) >= 0 THEN \'DR\' ElSE \'CR\' END AS Debit_Credit,\n \'Forecast\' AS Forecast_Type,\n REF.VERSION_NAME AS Version_name,\n DAT.UOM\nFROM RELATIONAL.FORECAST_ASSET_REFERENCE REF\nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_PARAM PAR\nON REF.FUND_ID = PAR.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = PAR.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = PAR.VERSION_NAME \nJOIN STAGING.FORECAST_DATA DAT\nON REF.FUND_ID = DAT.FUND_ID AND REF.ASSET_ID = DAT.ASSET_ID AND REF.VERSION_NAME = DAT.VERSION_NAME \nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.FORECAST_GL_PRODUCT_MAP PRD\nON DAT.FUND_ID = PRD.FUND_ID AND DAT.ASSET_ID = PRD.ASSET_ID AND DAT.STATUS = PRD.STATUS AND DAT.PRODUCT = PRD.Product AND PRD.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nLEFT JOIN RELATIONAL.CHART_OF_ACCOUNT COA\nON PRD.GL_CODE = COA.GL_CODE AND COA.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0\nWHERE REF.ISPROCESSED = 0 AND REF.RECORD_DELETED_FLAG = 0 \nAND DAT.STATUS != \'\' AND DAT.STATUS IS NOT NULL\nAND CAST(REF.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT) >= CAST(PAR.ASSET_OFFSET AS INT)',
	format: 'query') ~> StagingDB
StagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Period_Date,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Status,
		Product,
		GL_Code,
		Cash_Flow_Code,
		Perpetual_Amount,
		Current_Amount,
		Future_Amount,
		Share_Perpetual,
		Debit_Credit,
		Forecast_Type,
		Version_name,
		UOM,
		Entity,
		Category,
		Destination

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as string,
		Text_Response as string,
		Numeric_Response as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
ExcludeBlankTextResponseNumericResponse derive(PrimaryKeysValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period) || isNull(UID) || isNull(Answer_Number), "Asset or Fund or UID or Answer Number cannot be blank/", ""),
		TextAndNumericResponseValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Text_Response)) && not(isNull(Numeric_Response_ToDecimal)), "Only one of Text Response or Numeric Response can have value", ""),
		NumericResponseValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Numeric_Response)), iif(not(isNull(toDecimal(Numeric_Response))),"", "Numeric Response must be a number"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',PrimaryKeysValidateMsg, TextAndNumericResponseValidateMsg, NumericResponseValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response = Numeric_Response_ToDecimal,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(PrimaryKeysValidateMsg,TextAndNumericResponseValidateMsg,NumericResponseValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Answer_Number = iifNull(toInteger(Answer_Number), 1),
		Numeric_Response_ToDecimal = toDecimal(Numeric_Response, 19, 4)) ~> DateTypeTransform
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 0 && 
( not(isNull(UID)) || not(isNull(Attribute)) || 
not(isNull(Text_Response)) || not(isNull(Numeric_Response)) )) ~> ExcludeBlankTextResponseNumericResponse
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		UID,
		Attribute,
		Answer_Number,
		Text_Response,
		Numeric_Response,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	)) ~> ErrorTable

parameters{
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		UID as string,
		Attribute as string,
		Answer_Number as integer,
		Text_Response as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceReadyLoad
SourceReadyLoad select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectKeyColumnsForDelete
SelectKeyColumnsForDelete aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period),
	UniqueCount = count()) ~> AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod
AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete
AlterRowDelete sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetRelational

source(output(

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

	),

MapColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,

	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,

	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,

		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,

		Answer_Number,

	),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Certification_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Certification_Type as string,
		Certification_Number as string,
		Next_Audit_Date as string,
		Certifying_Body as string,
		Certification_Date as string,
		Certification_End_Date as string,
		Certified_Entity as string,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS as string,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Certification_Type_Code as string,
		Certification_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Certification_Type_Code\n      ,Certification_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsCertificationType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Certification_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Certification_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Certification',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalCertification
LookupCertificationType derive(CertificationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Certification_Type_Code_Lkp), "Certification Type/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		CertificationEndDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Certification_End_Date)),iif(isNull(Certification_End_Date_toDate), "Certification End Date/", ""),"Certification End Date/"),
		ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Certification_ID),"Null Certification ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Certification_Certification_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Certification_Asset_ID_Lkp,Certification_Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Certitication ID not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalCertificationIDValidateMsg,
CertificationTypeValidateMsg,
CertificationEndDateValidateMsg,
ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Certification_ID,
		Certification_Number,
		Next_Audit_Date,
		Certifying_Body,
		Certification_Date,
		Certification_End_Date = Certification_End_Date_toDate,
		Certified_Entity,
		Number_of_Open_Minor_CARS,
		Number_of_Open_Major_CARS,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Certification_Type_Code = Certification_Type_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Contract_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Execution_Date as string,
		Termination_Date as string,
		Contracted_Party_Company_Name as string,
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract as string,
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Type_of_goods_or_services as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Execution_Date as date,
		Termination_Date as date,
		Company_Name as string,
		Contract_Value as decimal(19,4),
		Contract_Currency as string,
		Contract_Type as string,
		Executed_By_Entity1 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity2 as string,
		Executed_By_Entity3 as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Contract_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Execution_Date]\n      ,[Termination_Date]\n      ,[Company_Name]\n      ,[Contract_Value]\n      ,[Contract_Currency]\n      ,[Contract_Type]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity1]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity2]\n      ,[Executed_By_Entity3]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n      ,[Contract_ID]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Contract]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalContractLkp
LookupContract derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Contract_ID),"Null Contract ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Contract_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Contract ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		ContractValueValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal), "Contract Value/", ""),
		ExecutionDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Execution_Date_toDate)),"","Execution Date/"),"Execution Date/"),
		TerminationDateValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Termination_Date_toDate)),"","Termination Date/"),"Termination Date/"),
		TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services),"Type of Goods and Services/",""),
		ContractCurrencyValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Contract_Currency),"Contract Currency/",""),
		Entity1ValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1),"Entity 1/","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,
ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,
TerminationDateValidateMsg,
TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,
ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,
Entity1ValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg, ContractValueValidateMsg,
ExecutionDateValidateMsg,TerminationDateValidateMsg,TypeOfGoodsAndServiceValidateMsg,ContractCurrencyValidateMsg,Entity1ValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Contract_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Execution_Date,
		Termination_Date,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract,
		Contract_Currency,
		Contract_Type = Type_of_goods_or_services,
		Executed_By_Entity1 = Executed_By_Entity_1,
		Executed_By_Entity2 = Executed_By_Entity_2,
		Executed_By_Entity3 = Executed_By_Entity_3,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Execution_Date)) || not(isNull(Termination_Date)) || 
not(isNull(Contracted_Party_Company_Name)) || not(isNull(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract)) || not(isNull(Contract_Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Type_of_goods_or_services)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_1)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_2)) || not(isNull(Executed_By_Entity_3))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Execution_Date_toDate = toDate(Execution_Date),
		Termination_Date_toDate = toDate(Termination_Date),
		Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal = toDecimal(Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract, 19, 4),
		Contract_ID = toInteger(Contract_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)

		Contract_ID,

		Execution_Date = Execution_Date_toDate,
		Termination_Date = Termination_Date_toDate,
		Company_Name = Contracted_Party_Company_Name,
		Contract_Value = Estimated_Maximum_Contract_Value_over_the_course_of_the_contract_toDecimal,

	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
