transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Harvest_Unit as string,
		Harvest_Operation_Type as string,
		Product as string,
		Species as string,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit as string,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement as string,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Predicted_Revenue as string,
		Predicted_Stumpage as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Fees_Levies_etc as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance as string,
		Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other as string,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation as string,
		Actual_Revenue as string,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT as string,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance as string,
		Actual_Sales_Expense_Other as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
LookupSpeciesType derive(OperationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Operation_Type_Code_Lkp), "Operation Type/", ""),
		SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species Type/", ""),
		PredictedHarvestedGmtValidateMssg = iif(not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT)),iif(not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal)),"","Predicted Harvested GMT/"),"Predicted Harvested GMT/"),
		ActualHarvestedGmtValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT)),iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal)),"","Actual Harvested GMT/"),"Actual Harvested GMT/"),
		ActualHarvestCommencementValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement)),iif(not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement_toDate)),"","Actual Harvest Commencement/"),"Actual Harvest Commencement/"),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',OperationTypeValidateMsg, SpeciesTypeValidateMsg, PredictedHarvestedGmtValidateMssg, ActualHarvestedGmtValidateMsg, ActualHarvestCommencementValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Product_Code = Product,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT = Predicted_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement = Actual_Harvest_Commencement_toDate,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation = Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT = Actual_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(OperationTypeValidateMsg,SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,PredictedHarvestedGmtValidateMssg,ActualHarvestedGmtValidateMsg,ActualHarvestCommencementValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type = Harvest_Operation_Type,
		Product,
		Species,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Harvest_Unit)) || not(isNull(Harvest_Operation_Type)) || not(isNull(Product)) || 
not(isNull(Species)) || not(isNull(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvest_Commencement)) || 
not(isNull(Predicted_Harvested_GMT)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Fees_Levies_etc)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage)) || 
not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance)) || not(isNull(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation)) || not(isNull(Actual_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_GMT)) || not(isNull(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting)) || 
not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance)) || not(isNull(Actual_Sales_Expense_Other))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit = toDecimal(Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal = toDecimal(Predicted_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Revenue = toDecimal(Predicted_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Predicted_Stumpage = toDecimal(Predicted_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement_toDate = toDate(Actual_Harvest_Commencement),
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation = toDate(Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation),
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area, 19, 4),
		Actual_Harvested_GMT_toDecimal = toDecimal(Actual_Harvested_GMT, 19, 4),
		Actual_Revenue = toDecimal(Actual_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Cartage, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Harvesting, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance, 19, 4),
		Predicted_SE_Other = toDecimal(Predicted_Sales_Expense_Other, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Managers_Fees_Levies, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Cartage = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Cartage, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Harvesting = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Harvesting, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Roading_Capex_Maintenance, 19, 4),
		Actual_SE_Other = toDecimal(Actual_Sales_Expense_Other, 19, 4)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Operation_Type_Code_Lkp = Operation_Type_Code,
		Operation_Type_Lkp = Operation_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOperationTypeLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectOperationTypeLkp lookup(Harvest_Operation_Type == Operation_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupOperationType
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupOperationType, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Product_Code,
		Species_Code,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconcilation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,
		Actual_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Actual_SE_Other
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Harvest_Unit,
		Operation_Type,
		Product,
		Species,
		Total_Net_Stocked_Area_of_Harvest_Unit,
		Predicted_Harvested_GMT,
		Predicted_Revenue,
		Predicted_Stumpage,
		Actual_Harvest_Commencement,
		Actual_Date_of_Reconciliation,
		Actual_Harvested_Net_Stocked_Area,
		Actual_Harvested_GMT,
		Actual_Revenue,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Predicted_SE_Ex_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Predicted_SE_Cartage,
		Predicted_SE_Harvesting,
		Predicted_SE_Roading_Capex_Maintanence,
		Predicted_SE_Other,
		Actual_SE_Managers_Fees_Levys,
		Actual_SE_Cartage,
		Actual_SE_Harvesting,

		Actual_SE_Other,

	)) ~> ErrorTable

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string ("2020-08-28T06:05:53.4181322Z"),
	CurrentRunDateTime as string ("2020-08-01"),
	WorkbookName as string ("Wenita Forestry Products Q4 FY20 V2.xlsx"),
	TabName as string ("Major Severe Incidents"),
	CurrentQuarterDate as string ("2020-06-30"),
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Incident_Type as string,
		Category as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Incident_Type_Code\n      ,Incident_Type\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident_Type\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOpsIncidentType
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Incident_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Asset_ID\n      ,Fund_ID\n      ,Reporting_Period\n      ,Incident_ID\n  FROM relational.OPS_Incident',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncident
LookupIncidentType derive(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp), "Incident Type Lookup Error/", ""),
		Incident_Date_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Date), "Blank Incident Date/", ""),
		Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Incident_Severity), "Blank Incident Severity/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Incident_Id),"Null Incident ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Incident_ID_Lkp)),iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Incident ID does not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Incident_Type_Validate_Msg,Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Incident_Type_Validate_Msg, Incident_Date_Validate_Msg,Incident_Severity_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateIncidentIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalIncidentIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 &&
(not(isNull(Incident_Id)) || not(isNull(Incident_Type)) || not(isNull(Incident_Severity)) ||
not(isNull(Incident_Description)) || not(isNull(Investigation_Undertaken)) || not(isNull(Incident_Findings)) || not(isNull(Incident_Date))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalOpsIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Incident_Type_Code_Lkp = Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Type_Lkp = Incident_Type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentTypeLkp
LookupIncidents, SelectIncidentTypeLkp lookup(Incident_Type == Incident_Type_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(Incident_Type_Code_Lkp, false),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidentType
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalIncident select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Incident_ID_Lkp = Incident_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectIncidentLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectIncidentLkp lookup(Incident_Id == Incident_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIncidents
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Id,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Work_Book,
		Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Operation_Type as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Cost_of_Treatment as string,
		Average_Unit_Cost as string,
		Budget_Area_Treated as string,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Cost as string,
		variation_Area_Treated as string,
		variation_Treatment_Cost as string,
		variation_Unit_Cost as string,
		Date_Last_Age_Class_Established as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Operation_Type_Code]\n      ,[Operation_Type]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Operation_Type]\nWHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalOperationType
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string,
		Species_Group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n      ,[Species_Group]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\nWHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSpeciesType
LookupSpeciesType derive(OperationTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Operation_Type_Code_Lkp), "Operation Type/", ""),
		AreaTreatedValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated)),iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated_toDecimal)),"","Area Treated/"),"Area Treated/"),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		SpeciesSurvivedValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Species_Survived)), iif(not(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp)), "", "Species Survived/"), "")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',OperationTypeValidateMsg, AreaTreatedValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,SpeciesSurvivedValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code_Lkp,
		Area_Treated = Area_Treated_toDecimal,
		Treatment_Cost = Cost_of_Treatment,
		Unit_Cost = Average_Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date = Date_Last_Age_Class_Established,
		Species_Survived = Species_Code_Lkp,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(OperationTypeValidateMsg,AreaTreatedValidateMsg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,SpeciesSurvivedValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost = Cost_of_Treatment,
		Unit_Cost = Average_Unit_Cost,
		Budget_Area_Treated,
		Budget_Treatment_Cost,
		Budget_Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date = Date_Last_Age_Class_Established,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = Survival_rate_of_last_age_class_established,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Risk_Opp_ID as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Risk_Sub_Class as string,
		Risk_Class as string,
		Risk_Description as string,
		Actions_and_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as string,
		Likelihood as string,
		Severity as string,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as string,
		Eliminate_or_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as string,
		Residual_Severity as string,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as string,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code as string,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton as string,
		Actions_Controls as string,
		Date_Lodged as date,
		Likelihood as short,
		Severity as short,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating as short,
		Eliminate_Mitigate as string,
		Residual_Likelihood as short,
		Residual_Severity as short,
		Residual_Risk_Rating as short,
		Future_Controls as string,
		Person_Responsible as string,
		Date_Closed as date,
		Quarterly_Incidents as integer,
		Risk_Opps_Flag as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Risk_Opp_ID as integer,
		Risk_Opp_Class as string,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code]\n      ,[Risk_Ops_Descripton]\n      ,[Actions_Controls]\n      ,[Date_Lodged]\n      ,[Likelihood]\n      ,[Severity]\n      ,[Inherent_Risk_Rating]\n      ,[Eliminate_Mitigate]\n      ,[Residual_Likelihood]\n      ,[Residual_Severity]\n      ,[Residual_Risk_Rating]\n      ,[Future_Controls]\n      ,[Person_Responsible]\n      ,[Date_Closed]\n      ,[Quarterly_Incidents]\n      ,[Risk_Opps_Flag]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n      ,[Risk_Opp_ID]\n      ,[Risk_Opp_Class]\n      ,[Risk_Opp_Sub_Class]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Risk_Opportunity_Register]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalRiskOpsRegister
LookupRiskOp derive(Risk_Class_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Risk_Class),'Risk Class/',''),
		Date_Lodged_Validate_Msg = iif(isNull(Date_Lodged_toDate),'Date Lodged/',''),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Risk_Opp_ID),"Null Contract ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Risk_Opp_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Contract ID not belong to Asset/"),"")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',Risk_Class_Validate_Msg,Date_Lodged_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class = Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Opp_Class = Risk_Class,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton = Risk_Description,
		Actions_Controls = Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged = Date_Lodged_toDate,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate = Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(Risk_Class_Validate_Msg,Date_Lodged_Validate_Msg,AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,ReportingDateContractIDValidateMsg,LkpRelationalContractIDValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class = Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Opp_Class = Risk_Class,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton = Risk_Description,
		Actions_Controls = Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate = Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Risk_Sub_Class)) || not(isNull(Risk_Class)) || 
not(isNull(Risk_Description)) || not(isNull(Actions_and_Controls)) || not(isNull(Date_Lodged)) || 
not(isNull(Likelihood)) || not(isNull(Severity)) || not(isNull(Inherent_Risk_Rating)) || not(isNull(Eliminate_or_Mitigate)) || 
not(isNull(Residual_Likelihood)) || not(isNull(Residual_Severity)) || not(isNull(Residual_Risk_Rating)) || 
not(isNull(Future_Controls)) || not(isNull(Person_Responsible)) || not(isNull(Date_Closed))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty
SourceDataTab derive(Risk_Opp_ID = toInteger(Risk_Opp_ID),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Likelihood = toShort(Likelihood),
		Severity = toShort(Severity),
		Inherent_Risk_Rating = toShort(Inherent_Risk_Rating),
		Residual_Likelihood = toShort(Residual_Likelihood),
		Residual_Severity = toShort(Residual_Severity),
		Residual_Risk_Rating = toShort(Residual_Risk_Rating),
		Date_Closed = toDate(Date_Closed),
		Date_Lodged_toDate = toDate(Date_Lodged),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Opp_ID,
		Risk_Opp_Sub_Class = Risk_Sub_Class,
		Risk_Opp_Class = Risk_Class,
		Risk_Ops_Descripton = Risk_Description,
		Actions_Controls = Actions_and_Controls,
		Date_Lodged = Date_Lodged_toDate,
		Likelihood,
		Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate = Eliminate_or_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
ExcludeFirstRowandEmpty, SelectRiskOpsLookup lookup(Risk_Opp_ID == Risk_Opp_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupRiskOp
RelationalRiskOpsRegister select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code_Lkp = Risk_Ops_Sub_Class_Code,

		Actions_Controls_Lkp = Actions_Controls,

		Likelihood_Lkp = Likelihood,
		Severity_Lkp = Severity,
		Inherent_Risk_Rating_Lkp = Inherent_Risk_Rating,
		Eliminate_Mitigate_Lkp = Eliminate_Mitigate,
		Residual_Likelihood_Lkp = Residual_Likelihood,
		Residual_Severity_Lkp = Residual_Severity,
		Residual_Risk_Rating_Lkp = Residual_Risk_Rating,
		Future_Controls_Lkp = Future_Controls,
		Person_Responsible_Lkp = Person_Responsible,
		Date_Closed_Lkp = Date_Closed,
		Quarterly_Incidents_Lkp = Quarterly_Incidents,
		Risk_Opps_Flag_Lkp = Risk_Opps_Flag,

		Risk_Opp_ID_Lkp = Risk_Opp_ID,

	),

transformations.name: ValidateMandatoryColumns
transformations.description: ReportingDateCertificationIDValidateMsg is a test and should be considered as part of the conditional split Insert/Update activity

transformations.name: SplitInsertAndUpdate
transformations.description:
1. The condition assume that the records from the current reporting period are deleted first if any (asset id, fund id, current reporting period)
2. Records where reporting period equal current reporting period (disregard certification id) are inserted/reinserted after delete in 1
3. Remaining records are not from current reporting period and the certification ids must not be null. These are updated

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Project_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Deliverable_Project_Weighting as string,
		Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date as string,
		Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date as string,
		Current_Progress_Percent_Complete as string,
		Notes as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Project_ID as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Primary_Management_Activity as string,
		Project_Objectives as string,
		Expected_Value_Impact as string,
		Deliverable as string,
		Project_Weighting as short,
		Expected_Completion_Date as date,
		Planned_Completion_Date as date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete as short,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID]\n      ,[Fund_ID]\n      ,[Project_ID]\n      ,[Reporting_Period]\n      ,[Primary_Management_Activity]\n      ,[Project_Objectives]\n      ,[Expected_Value_Impact]\n      ,[Deliverable]\n      ,[Project_Weighting]\n      ,[Expected_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Planned_Completion_Date]\n      ,[Current_Progress_Perc_Complete]\n      ,[Insert_Datetime]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Strategic_Project]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp
LookupStrategicProject derive(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(iif(CurrentReportingPeriod != Reporting_Period, true(), false()) && isNull(Project_ID),"Null Project ID for non-current Reporting Period/",""),
		LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Project_ID_Lkp)),
iif(equals(concat(Asset_ID_Lkp,Fund_ID_Lkp), concat(Asset_ID,Fund_ID)),"","Project ID not belong to Asset/"),""),
		PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity), "Primary Management Activity/",""),
		ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate)),"","Expected Completion Date/"),"Expected Completion Date/"),
		PlannedCompletionValidateMsg = iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)),iif(not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate)),"","Planned Completion Date/"),"Planned Completion Date/")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg,
ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg,
PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg, ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg, PlannedCompletionValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Insert select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(AssetReportingDateValidateMsg, ReportingDateProjectIDValidateMsg, LkpRelationalProjectIDValidateMsg, 
PrimaryManageActivityValidateMsg, ExpectedCompletionValidateMsg, PlannedCompletionValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
SourceDataTab derive(Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate = toDate(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date),
		Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate = toDate(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date),
		Project_Weighting = toShort(Deliverable_Project_Weighting),
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete = toShort(toDecimal(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete, 3, 2) * 100),
		Project_ID = toInteger(Project_ID),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate)) ~> DateTypeTransform
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows split(equals(Reporting_Period, CurrentReportingPeriod),
	disjoint: false) ~> SplitInsertAndUpdate@(Insert, Update)
UpdateDatetimeValue select(mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Planned_Completion_Date = Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date_toDate,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsOutputUpdate
SplitInsertAndUpdate@Update derive(Update_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Insert_Datetime = Insert_Datetime_Lkp) ~> UpdateDatetimeValue
RelationalStrategicProjectsLkp select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID_Lkp = Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID_Lkp = Fund_ID,
		Project_ID_Lkp = Project_ID,
		Reporting_Period_Lkp = Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity_Lkp = Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives_Lkp = Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact_Lkp = Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable_Lkp = Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting_Lkp = Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date_Lkp = Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date_Lkp = Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete_Lkp = Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime_Lkp = Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectStrategicProjectsLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectStrategicProjectsLkp lookup(Project_ID == Project_ID_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupStrategicProject
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Primary_Management_Activity)) || not(isNull(Project_Objectives)) || 
not(isNull(Expected_Value_Impact)) || not(isNull(Deliverable)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Project_Weighting)) || 
not(isNull(Deliverable_Expected_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Deliverable_Planned_Completion_Date)) || not(isNull(Current_Progress_Percent_Complete))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ErrorTable
SelectColumnsOutputUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'Update'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Project_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Primary_Management_Activity,
		Project_Objectives,
		Expected_Value_Impact,
		Deliverable,
		Project_Weighting,
		Expected_Completion_Date,
		Planned_Completion_Date,
		Current_Progress_Perc_Complete,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistenParquetUpdate

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	MasterUtcTag as string,
	CurrentRunDateTime as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	TabName as string,
	CurrentQuarterDate as string,
	MasterPipeline as string
}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Validation_Flag as string,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_or_Export as string,
		Species as string,
		Product_Type as string,
		Delivery_Point as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Sales_Unit as string,
		Sales_Quantity as string,
		Average_Sales_Price as string,
		Sales_Revenue as string,
		Production_Cost as string,
		Stumpage as string,
		Unit_Stumpage as string,
		Currency as string,
		Month as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as string,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as string,
		Budget_Production_Cost as string,
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SourceDataTab
source(output(
		Species_Code as string,
		Species as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Species_Code]\n      ,[Species]\n  FROM [relational].[OPS_Species_Type]\n  WHERE [Active_YN] = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query',
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> RelationalSpeciesType
source(output(
		Sales_Unit_Code as string,
		Sales_Unit as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Sales_Unit_Code\n      ,Sales_Unit\n  FROM relational.OPS_Sales_Unit\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalSalesUnit
source(output(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT Price_Point_Code\n      ,Price_Point\n  FROM relational.OPS_Price_Point\n  WHERE Active_YN = \'Y\'',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDeliveryPoint
LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint derive(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Species_Code_Lkp), "Species/", ""),
		SalesUnitValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp), "Sales Unit/", ""),
		AssetReportingDateValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Asset_ID) || isNull(Fund_ID) || isNull(Reporting_Period), "Invalid Asset or Reporting Period/", ""),
		DeliveryPointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Price_Point_Code_Lkp), "Delivery Point/", ""),
		CustomerValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Customer),"Customer/",""),
		DomesticExportValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Domestic_or_Export),"Domestic or Export/",""),
		PricePointValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Delivery_Point),"Price Point/",""),
		SalesQtyValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Sales_Quantity),"Sales Quantity/",""),
		ProductTypeValidateMsg = iif(isNull(Product_Type),"Product Type/","")) ~> ValidateMandatoryColumns
ValidateMandatoryColumns split(length(concatWS('',SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
CustomerValidateMsg,
DomesticExportValidateMsg,
PricePointValidateMsg,
SalesQtyValidateMsg,
ProductTypeValidateMsg)) == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> SegregateValidInvalidRows@(ValidRows, InvalidRows)
SegregateValidInvalidRows@ValidRows select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code = Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp,
		Species_Code = Species_Code_Lkp
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedColumnsOutputInsert
SegregateValidInvalidRows@InvalidRows derive(ConcatenatedMessage = concat(SpeciesTypeValidateMsg,
SalesUnitValidateMsg,
AssetReportingDateValidateMsg,
DeliveryPointValidateMsg,
CustomerValidateMsg,
DomesticExportValidateMsg,
PricePointValidateMsg,
SalesQtyValidateMsg,
ProductTypeValidateMsg)) ~> ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage
ConcatenateInvalidColumnsMessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Validation_Flag,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export = Domestic_or_Export,
		Species,
		Product = Product_Type,
		Delivery_Point_Code = Delivery_Point,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code = Currency,
		Sales_Month = Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage = Budget_Unit_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Source_File = Work_Book,
		Source_Sub_File = Work_Sheet,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc = ConcatenatedMessage
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectedOutputColumnsError
DateTypeTransform keyGenerate(output(RowNumber as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> GenerateRowNumber
GenerateRowNumber filter(RowNumber > 1 && 
(not(isNull(Customer)) || not(isNull(Domestic_or_Export)) || not(isNull(Species)) || 
not(isNull(Product_Type)) || not(isNull(Delivery_Point)) || not(isNull(Price_Point)) || 
not(isNull(Sales_Unit)) || not(isNull(Sales_Quantity)) || not(isNull(Average_Sales_Price)) || 
not(isNull(Production_Cost)) || not(isNull(Currency)) || 
not(isNull(Month)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Quantity)) || not(isNull(Budget_Sales_Revenue)) || not(isNull(Budget_Production_Cost)) || 
not(isNull(Budget_Unit_Stumpage))
)) ~> ExcludeFirstRow
SourceDataTab derive(Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'),
		Update_Datetime = toTimestamp('9999-12-31 00:00:00'),
		Work_Book = $WorkbookName,
		Work_Sheet = $TabName,
		Process_Name = concatWS('-',$MasterPipeline,$WorkbookName,$TabName),
		CurrentReportingPeriod = toDate($CurrentQuarterDate),
		Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period),
		Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Production_Cost = toDecimal(Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Stumpage = toDecimal(Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Average_Sales_Price = toDecimal(Average_Sales_Price, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Quantity = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Quantity, 19, 4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue = toDecimal(Budget_Sales_Revenue, 19, 4),
		Budget_Production_Cost = toDecimal(Budget_Production_Cost, 19, 4),
		Budget_Unit_Stumpage = toDecimal(Budget_Unit_Stumpage, 19, 4),
		Price_Point = toDecimal(Price_Point, 19, 4),
		Month = toDate(Month)) ~> DateTypeTransform
RelationalSpeciesType select(mapColumn(
		Species_Code_Lkp = Species_Code,
		Species_Lkp = Species
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSpeciesTypeLkp
LookupSalesUnit, SelectSpeciesTypeLkp lookup(Species == Species_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSpeciesType
RelationalSalesUnit select(mapColumn(
		Sales_Unit_Code_Lkp = Sales_Unit_Code,
		Sales_Unit_Lkp = Sales_Unit
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSalesUnitLkp
ExcludeFirstRow, SelectSalesUnitLkp lookup(Sales_Unit == Sales_Unit_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupSalesUnit
RelationalDeliveryPoint select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code_Lkp = Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point_Lkp = Price_Point
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectPricePointLkp
LookupSpeciesType, SelectPricePointLkp lookup(Delivery_Point == Price_Point_Code_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupPricePointFromDeliveryPoint
SelectedColumnsOutputInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:[(concatWS("_", $WorkbookName, $TabName,$CurrentQuarterDate,'LoadReady'))],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Sales_Month,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Update_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Sales_Unit_Code,
		Species_Code
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> TargetPersistentParquetInsert
SelectedOutputColumnsError sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period,
		Species,
		Customer,
		Domestic_Export,
		Sales_Unit,
		Sales_Quantity,
		Sales_Revenue,
		Production_Cost,
		Stumpage,
		Unit_Stumpage,
		Currency_Code,
		Average_Sales_Price,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity,
		Budget_Sales_Revenue,
		Budget_Production_Cost,
		Budget_Stumpage,
		Insert_Datetime,
		Process_Name,
		Product,
		Delivery_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Sales_Month,
		Source_File,
		Source_Sub_File,
		Error_Desc
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ErrorTable

}
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Customer as string,
		Domestic_Export as string,
		Product as string,
		Delivery_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Average_Sales_Price as decimal(19,4),

		Fund_ID,

AggregateAssetFundReportingPeriod alterRow(deleteIf(UniqueCount>0)) ~> AlterRowDelete

	),

transformations.name: MapDrifted2
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		type as string,
		properties as (Asset_Id as string, Fund_Id as string, OBJECTID as string, Property as string, Crop_Type as string, Plant_Year as string, State as string, Area_Ha as double, SHAPE_Leng as double, SHAPE_Area as double),
		geometry as (type as string, coordinates as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	backslashEscape: true) ~> geojsonmodified
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID = asset_id,
		Fund_ID = fund_id,
		Loc_Json = loc_json
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
geojsonmodified derive({_corrupt_record} = toString(byName('_corrupt_record')),
		asset_id = properties.Asset_Id,
		fund_id = properties.Fund_Id,
		loc_json = geometry.coordinates) ~> MapDrifted2
MapDrifted2 filter(not(isNull(asset_id))) ~> Filter1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		asset_id as string,
		fund_id as string,
		loc_geometry as binary,
		loc_json as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		asset_id = Asset_ID,
		fund_id = Fund_ID,
		loc_json = Loc_Json
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
